name: Sherlock Holmes Chapter One Season Pass
name_original: Sherlock Holmes Chapter One Season Pass
description:
Keep your investigation going with the Season Pass, featuring new quests:
  • Saints and Sinners' DLC (available on release day)
  • Mycroft's Pride' DLC (coming later)
  • M for Mystery' DLC (coming later)
  • Beyond A Joke' DLC (coming later)
